title: Why Planes Crash - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/14/19
itunes:title: Why Planes Crash - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/14/19
description:
George Noory and airline safety expert David Soucie explore his career working to improve airplane safety, and his theories on what caused the Ethiopian jet crash that killed 157 passengers and crew.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
